title: Unity Iron to Gold Trials
body: Unity is looking for Gold IV - Gold 1 players to trial for Unity White/Black. The trials will be happening Tuesday 22nd at 6pm AEST. If you're interested please fill out this form and join the discord server.

replies.body: hi can i join unerty im big fan {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
